page.title: 15 EDUCATION IN LEWES
page.content: East Sussex County Council provides Lewes' Primary, Secondary and Further Education. Of 6{Primary Schools,}3 are Church Schools and one has a nursery class. Lewes Priory, the{comprehensive {school,}serves Lewes from 3 sites, reflecting a l969 amalgamation of boys and girls' grammar schools + secondary modern.6th form students come to Lewes from Ringmer + Chailey feeder schools. { Lewes Technical College}provides Further and Adult Education for a big catchment including Lewes town.Post-l6 education may soon be re-organised, following Government requirements to act on falling rolls by reviewing local educational provision. { Pre-School}provision is in voluntary Playgroups. Funds for {nursery schooling, Youth Service and {Adult Education}are desperately needed but have been cut in recent years.
